info.title: UiTPAS Admin
info.description: An administration interface for UiTPAS, a system to manage users and activities of cultural offers in the Flanders region. Most operations require that you authenticate first with your UiTID.

get.summary: View the details of a specific cultural event.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The path to redirect to when the operation is complete.

302.description: Redirect to the OAuth service which redirects to the destination path.

get.summary: Retrieve all information about the current user.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: The infoformation available about the current user.

403.description: The user is not authenticated.

get.summary: Log the current user out.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: The user is logged out.

403.description: Someone tried to log out when no one was logged in.

500.description: An error the first time someone tries to log out when no one is logged in.

get.summary: Get a list of counters.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: Returns a list of counters to which the current user is assigned.

403.description: The user is not authenticated.

get.summary: Get the active counter.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: The counter currently active for the current user.

403.description: The user is not authenticated.

404.description: The user does not have an active counter.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the id of the counter to set as active for the current user.

200.description: The counter that has been set active.

403.description: The user is not authenticated.

404.description: The user does not have a counter with the given id.

get.summary: Get a list of schools related to the active counter.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: A list of schools related to the active counter.

403.description: The user is not authenticated.

get.summary: Find an identity by identification number. An identity is a combination of an UiTPAS and its owner (an individual or a group).
get.description: Authentication and active counter is required.

parameters.name: identificationNumber
parameters.description: The identification number to search the identity with.

200.description: The information about the identity.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

404.description: No identity found with this identification.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number.

200.description: The information about the uitpas.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

put.summary: Registers the specified uitpas to an existing passholder.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the uitpas registration info.

200.description: The information about the uitpas.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

get.summary: Retrieve the price to register the specified uitpas.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the UiTPAS purchase.

parameters.name: date_of_birth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the passholder.

parameters.name: postal_code
parameters.description: Postal code of the passholder.

parameters.name: voucher_number
parameters.description: Voucher number of the passholder.

200.description: A price object.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Retrieve the price to register the specified uitpas.

parameters.name: cardSystemId
parameters.description: Card system id of the system to get the price for.

parameters.name: date_of_birth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the passholder.

parameters.name: postal_code
parameters.description: Postal code of the passholder.

parameters.name: voucher_number
parameters.description: Voucher number of the passholder.

200.description: A price object.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Get a list of passholders.
get.description: Authentication required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: UiTPAS-number to include in the list of passholders. Add multiple uitpasNumber parameters to include multiple numbers. (uitpasNumber[]=123456&uitpasNumber[]=123457&uitpasNumber[]=123458)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which page of the result set to show. When omitted this defaults to 1 (the first page).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many passholders should be listed per page. When omitted this defaults to 10.

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: A date if birth.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: A first name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A last name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: A street name and number. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: A city name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: An email address. No wildcards allowed

parameters.name: membershipAssociationId
parameters.description: A group association ID.

parameters.name: membershipStatus
parameters.description: The group membership status.

200.description: A collection of passholders.

400.description: The provided parameters are incorrect, or an API error occurred.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

get.summary: Find a passholder by uitpas number.
get.description: Authentication and active counter is required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: The information about the passholder.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

404.description: No passholder found with this identification.

post.description: Authentication and active counter is required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the passholder info to update.

200.description: The information about the passholder.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter, or does not have permission to update the passholder.

put.description: Authentication and an active counter are required. The uitpas number should not be linked to a passholder.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: the uitpas number of an unregistered uitpas.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A collection of registration info.

200.description: The newly created passholder.

400.description: The uitpas number is already in use.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Find all exchangeable advantages for a passholder.
get.description: Authentication and active counter is required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: Returns a list of exchangeable advantages for the passholder.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

get.summary: Find an advantage for a passholder by uitpas number of the passholder and the advantage's id.
get.description: Authentication and active counter is required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: advantageId
parameters.description: The id of the advantage.

200.description: The information about the advantage.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or has no active counter.

404.description: No advantage found with this id.

post.summary: Exchange an advantage for a given passholder.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the id of the advantage to exchange for the passholder.

200.description: The advantage that has been exchanged.

400.description: The advantage is not exchangeable for the given passholder.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

404.description: No advantage found for the given id and passholder.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of activities.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Free search query.

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: Date range filter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which page of the result set to show. When omitted this defaults to 1 (the first page).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many items should be listed per page. When omitted this defaults to 5.

200.description: The information available about the activities.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the checkin info.

200.description: The activity with updated check-in constraints.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of ticketsales.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: The ticketsales for the given uitpasNumber.

400.description: The uitpasNumber is invalid or missing.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Sell a ticket to a passholder or group.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder or group.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the ticket sale info.

200.description: The registered ticket sale.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

delete.summary: Delete a ticketsale from the passholder or group.
delete.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder or group.

parameters.name: ticketSaleId
parameters.description: The id of the ticket sale that should be deleted.

200.description: Successfully deleted the ticket sale from the passholder or group.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Change specific information of a kansenstatuut.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter with kansenstatuut authorisation is required

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: cardSystemId
parameters.description: The card system ID that is linked to the kansenstatuut you want to edit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the kansenstatuut info that you want to change

200.description: The registered has been updated.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter with kansenstatuut permissions.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of actions increasing or decreasing the points.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: The checkins for the given uitpasNumber.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Add a passholder to a card system.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the card system upgrade information.

200.description: The passholder was registered correctly to the card system.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Create a new passholders export with the given bulk selection.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: UiTPAS-number to include in the list of passholders. Add multiple uitpasNumber parameters to include multiple numbers. (uitpasNumber[]=123456&uitpasNumber[]=123457&uitpasNumber[]=123458)

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: A date if birth.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: A first name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A last name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: A street name and number. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: A city name. Wildcard * allowed.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: An email address. No wildcards allowed

parameters.name: membershipAssociationId
parameters.description: A group association ID.

parameters.name: membershipStatus
parameters.description: The group membership status.

parameters.name: selection
parameters.description: A set of UitPAS-numbers to narrow down the export search selection. (uitpasNumber[]=123456&uitpasNumber[]=123457&uitpasNumber[]=123458)

200.description: A file containing the requested information

400.description: The provided parameters are incorrect, or an API error occurred.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: List checkin devices.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

200.description: Returns a list of available checkin devices.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Connect the CheckIn Device to an activity.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: checkInDeviceId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the CheckIn Device.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the UUID of the activity to connect the CheckIn Device with.

200.description: The checkin device was connected successfully.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: List activities available to connect devices to.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

200.description: Returns a list of available activities.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Create a new expense report for the given date range and the active counter.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the start and end date of the expense report.

200.description: Info about the expense report.

400.description: The provided parameters are incorrect, or an API error occurred.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Returns the status, and optionally the download uri, of the expense report.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: expenseReportId
parameters.description: The ID of the report that has been, or is being, generated.

200.description: The status, and optionally the download uri, of the expense report.

400.description: The provided parameters are incorrect, or an API error occurred.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: List members of the active counter.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

200.description: Returns a list of members of the counter.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

post.summary: Add a new member to the active counter.
post.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the email address of the user to add as a member to the counter.

200.description: Returns the uid of the new member.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

404.description: The provided email address is invalid or unknown.

delete.summary: Delete a member from the active counter.
delete.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The uid of the member that should be deleted.

200.description: Successfully deleted the member from the counter.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Returns all associations that the counter can read and register.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

200.description: Returns a list of associations that the counter can read and register to.

get.summary: Returns all activities for the counter.
get.description: Authentication and an active counter are required.

200.description: Returns a list of activities for the counter.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have an active counter.

get.summary: Get the help text and permissions.
get.description: Authentication is required.

200.description: Returns an object with the help text markdown and a list of UiTids for the users who can edit the markdown text.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the new help text markdown.

200.description: The help text was successfully changed.

403.description: The user is not authorised to change the help text.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the feedback form-elements.

200.description: The feedback was send successfully.

403.description: The user is not authorised to send feedback.

500.description: The feedback could not be sent because of a server error.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of coupons.
get.description: Authentication and an uitpasNumber are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: The coupons available for the given uitpasNumber.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have a valid uitpasNumber

get.summary: Retrieves passholders information, associations and memberships.
get.description: Authentication and an uitpasNumber are required.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: Information, associations and memberships belonging to the passholder.

403.description: The user is not authenticated or does not have a valid uitpasNumber

post.summary: Register the membership for the passholder.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the association-id and endDate.

200.description: The membership was registered successfully to the passholder.

403.description: The user is not authorised to register memberships.

500.description: The operation could not be performed because of a server error.

delete.summary: Remove a membership for the passholder.

parameters.name: uitpasNumber
parameters.description: The uitpas number of the passholder.

200.description: The feedback was send successfully.

403.description: The user is not authorised to stop memberships.

500.description: The operation could not be performed because of a server error.

tags.name: OAuth
tags.description: Operations related to authentication with OAuth.

tags.name: Help
tags.description: Operations related to the help text.

tags.name: Bulk operation
tags.description: Operations related to passholder bulk operations.

bio.example: Alberto Contador is a Spanish professional cyclist, one of six riders to have won all three Grand Tours of road cycling.

items.example: Can create passholders for other municipalities
Can create passholders for other municipalities

message.example: No active counter set for the current user.

passHolder.description: The individual pass holder owning the card. This property is mutually exclusive with 'group'.

group.description: The group of people owning the card. This property is mutually exclusive with 'passHolder'.

reason.description: Reason for the UiTPAS registration to an existing passholder.

invalidUitpasNumbers.description: A list unknown UiTPAS-numbers that were explicitly searched for.

amount.description: Number of tickets to be sold.

validForCities.description: Cities for which the advantage is valid, if empty valid for all cities.

endDate.description: The end date of the granting period.

description.example: Dit is een testevent dat tijdens de periode 1 september tot en met 31 oktober 2015 zal plaatsvinden. Dit event gaat betalend zijn

free.description: Indicates whether or not tickets for the activity are free.

points.description: The number of points that can be earned when checking in this activity.

allowed.description: Indicates if a user is allowed to check in an activity.

reason.description: The reason why a user is not allowed to check in an activity.

endDate.description: The end date of the kansenstatuut.

kansenStatuut.description: Whether or not this price is available for people with a kansenstatuut.

VoucherNumber.description: An optional voucher number to redeem.

prefix.description: A prefix that can used to validate the voucher type.

maximumReached.description: Indicates whether or not the total maximum of ticket sales has been reached.

differentiation.description: Indicates whether or not there is price differentiation.

base.description: Object with price classes as properties, and base prices as their values.

kansentariefAvailable.description: Whether or not kansentarief is available.

couponAvailable.description: Whether or not at least one coupon is available.

maximumReached.description: Indicates whether or not the maximum of ticket sales for this tariff has been reached.

prices.description: Object with price classes as properties, and tariff prices as their values.

points.description: Contains a minus sign for negative numbers.

PassholderRemarks.description: Additional information about the passholder. Kansenstatuut related info should go here.

id.description: Unique ID of the CheckIn Device.

name.description: Human readable name of the CheckIn Device.

activityId.description: Activity to which the CheckIn Device is currently connected.
Activity to connect the CheckIn Device to.

canUpdate.description: If the current user can update the help text or not.

text.example: This is some new fake *Markdown* text

description.example: Dit aanbod is geldig voor elke pashouder met een Paspartoe aan reductieprijs.

message.example: This is a fake feedback message.
